mapper.select: select * from pub_dictionary where pub_dictionary.type = #{type} and pub_dictionary.value=#{value} and pub_dictionary.status=1

SELECT pub_airportaddr.name, pub_airportaddr.lat, pub_airportaddr.lng FROM pub_airportaddr, pub_cityaddr WHERE pub_airportaddr.status=1 and pub_cityaddr.status=1 and pub_cityaddr.id=pub_airportaddr.city
and pub_cityaddr.city=#{city}
SELECT pub_dictionary.text FROM pub_dictionary where pub_dictionary.status=1 and pub_dictionary.type='用车事由' order by pub_dictionary.value
SELECT pub_dictionary.text FROM pub_dictionary where pub_dictionary.status=1 and pub_dictionary.type='用车备注' order by pub_dictionary.value
SELECT pub_dictionary.text FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.status = 1 and pub_dictionary.type='评价司机' order by pub_dictionary.value
SELECT gpsdirection, gpsspeed, lng, lat FROM pub_driver where status=1 and id=#{driverid}
SELECT pub_cityaddr.id FROM pub_cityaddr WHERE pub_cityaddr.status=1 and pub_cityaddr.city = #{citycaption} LIMIT 0,1
select pub_cityaddr.city from pub_cityaddr where pub_cityaddr.status=1 and pub_cityaddr.id=#{city}
SELECT * FROM pub_driver WHERE id = #{driverid}
UPDATE pub_driver SET avgrate = #{avgrate}, updatetime = now() WHERE id = #{driverid}

SELECT DISTINCT (pub_cityaddr.city), pub_cityaddr.cityInitials AS cityinitials FROM pub_cityaddr where pub_cityaddr.status=1 and pub_cityaddr.cityInitials IS NOT null
and ( pub_cityaddr.city LIKE '%${cityword}%' or pub_cityaddr.cityInitials LIKE '%${cityword}%' or pub_cityaddr.fullpinyin LIKE '%${cityword}%' )
ORDER BY pub_cityaddr.fullpinyin
select content from pub_personagreement where id = #{qaid} LIMIT 0,1
select content from pub_personagreement where status=1 ORDER BY updatetime desc limit 0,1
SELECT * from le_leasescompany where le_leasescompany.status=1 and le_leasescompany.id=#{companyid}
select * from op_platforminfo where op_platforminfo.status=1 LIMIT 0,1
select pub_dictionary.value as id,pub_dictionary.text as name from pub_dictionary where pub_dictionary.type='租赁公司' and pub_dictionary.status=1 ORDER BY pub_dictionary.createtime

SELECT DISTINCT (pub_cityaddr.city), pub_cityaddr.cityInitials AS cityinitials FROM pub_cityaddr where pub_cityaddr.status=1 and pub_cityaddr.hotcity=1 and pub_cityaddr.cityInitials IS NOT null
and ( pub_cityaddr.city LIKE '%${cityword}%' or pub_cityaddr.cityInitials LIKE '%${cityword}%' or pub_cityaddr.fullpinyin LIKE '%${cityword}%' )
ORDER BY pub_cityaddr.fullpinyin

SELECT DISTINCT (pub_cityaddr.city) FROM pub_cityaddr where pub_cityaddr.status=1 and pub_cityaddr.cityInitials IS NOT null
and ( pub_cityaddr.city LIKE '%${cityword}%' or pub_cityaddr.cityInitials LIKE '%${cityword}%' or pub_cityaddr.fullpinyin LIKE '%${cityword}%' )
ORDER BY pub_cityaddr.fullpinyin
select * from pub_dictionary where type = "附近司机" and status = 1 limit 1
select * from pub_dictionary where pub_dictionary.status=1 and pub_dictionary.type='订单返还开关'
select * from pub_dictionary where pub_dictionary.status=1 and pub_dictionary.type='订单折扣开关'
select * from pub_dictionary where pub_dictionary.status=1 and pub_dictionary.type=#{type}
select * from pub_dictionary where pub_dictionary.status=1 and pub_dictionary.type=#{type}
select * from pub_dictionary where pub_dictionary.status=1 and pub_dictionary.type='订单返还金额活动是否终止'
